item.title: Auth entication orization Beginner Intro
item.description: Learn about your “auth” - both “authentication” and “authorization” - some of the pitfalls and best practices about how to make this very important part of your application. You need to get this right… But it’s not that hard, these days. (more desc. coming)

item.title: Pre-Code, Roadmaps are better than empty files
